original_text: Now, friends, we ask you to pray for us. Pray that more and more people will soon hear the Lord's message. Pray that people will receive the message well and accept it as true. That is how you received it. Timothy Introduction
korean_text: 끝으로 형제들아 너희는 우리를 위하여 기도하기를 주의 말씀이 너희 가운데서와 같이 퍼져 나가 영광스럽게 되고

sentences.original_text: we ask you to pray for us

will soon hear the Lord's message
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 주님의 말씀을 듣게 되도록 기도하세요

sentences.original_text: Pray that people will receive the message well
That is how you received it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 바로 여러분이 그것을 받은 방식입니다
